newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese shares nudge higher in good volume.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese shares nudge higher in good volume.

text.p: 1645 GMT - Shares closed slightly higher overall in good volume with the tone on Friday likely to remain positive providing foreign bourses stay buoyant, traders said.
*PSI-20 .PSI20 gained 0.18 percent to 4,771.62 with overall cash volume 4.7 billion escudos. Futures were also slightly firmer.
*Cimpor was helped by its forecast for a full-year profit "at least" double the first half result of 11.6 billion escudos.
*But Portugal Telecom failed to sustain its early advance, triggered by the 56 percent boost in first half profit. The stock was being restrained by its slight loss in New York.
*The business in Modelo Continente -- 173,000 shares -- was a further shuffling of holdings within the Sonae group before the reorganisation.
